mainFirstBlocTitle: A huge island in your phone
mainFirstBlocSubtitle: Reliable audio guide to unfamiliar places
mainFirstBlockQr: Or use your smartphone camera and scan the QR code
secondBlockDescOne:
Planning your vacation and want to visit unusual places? Are you looking for those who will help make your vacation rich and comfortable? We are ready to offer New travel format for you!

Vidodo Guide team analyzed interestsand the needs of the guests of the island. This allowed us to create a convenient application where all the necessary information is collected.
secondBlockDescTwo:
According to official statistics, Lanzarote visits more than 3 million tourists a year.

Every tourist wants to receive impartial information on objects of interest to him. We do it for you: we introduce you, notify you, keep you informed using Vidodo Guide - an app that has many other useful features!

travelGuide:
Travel guide, audio guide, Navigator and your reliable friend in one app!
Now you can relax more comfortably, having everything you need at hand.
vidodoKnowsIslandDesc: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
grandTourText: You can go on a fascinating journey around the island with a unique author's audiobook. You don't even have to go anywhere - listen to interesting stories about local attractions, traditions, cultural features, history of the island and much more, while staying in one place. Explore Lanzarote anywhere in the world.

audioGuideTourText: Immerse yourself in the world of Lanzarote with fun audio guided tours. We have prepared for you the most popular routes, including Grand Tour, South Tour, North Tour, Caesar Manrique Tour and others. For cruise tourists, a route has been planned taking into account the time of the ships' stops.

whatIsCookieText: As is common on almost all professional websites, our site also uses cookies, which are tiny files that are downloaded to your computer or mobile device, to improve the site's performance and improve its efficiency. This page describes what information they collect, how we use it, and why we sometimes need to store these cookies. We will also tell you how you can prevent these files from being saved, but this may lead to deterioration or 'disruption' of certain elements of the site's functionality. For more information about cookies, see Wikipedia article about HTTP cookies.
howWeUseCookiesText: We use cookies for various reasons, described in detail below. Unfortunately, in most cases, there are no industry-standard options for disabling cookies without completely disabling the features they add to this site. It is recommended that you leave all cookies if you are not sure whether you need them or not, if they are used to provide the services You use.
disableCookiesText: You can prevent the installation of cookies by changing the settings in your browser (see below or in the browser's help). Keep in mind that disabling cookies will affect the functionality of this and many other websites that you visit. Disabling cookies usually results in disabling certain features and functions of this site. Therefore, we recommend that you do not disable cookies.
thirdPartyCookiesText: In some special cases, we also use cookies provided by trusted third parties. The following section describes in detail the third-party cookies that you may encounter on this site. This site uses Google Analytics, which is one of the most common and reliable Analytics solutions on the Internet, which helps us understand how you use the site and how we can improve its performance for You. Cookies can track things like the length of time you spend on the site and the pages you visit so that we can continue to create interesting content. For more information about Google Analytics cookies, see the Official Google Analytics page. On this site, we also use social media buttons and plugins that allow you to connect to your social network. Social media sites will set cookies through our site, which can be used to improve your profile on their site or to add data that they store for various purposes specified in their respective privacy policy. Since we sell products and services, it is important for us to understand statistics about how many visitors to our site actually make purchases, and therefore such data will track these cookies. This is important for You, as we will be able to make more accurate business forecasts and track ad spending to ensure the best product price.
managingInChromeText:
How to delete cookies:

1. Go to settings in the browser menu.
2. Click Show advanced settings.
3. Click Delete browsing data.
4. Select the time period for which you want to delete information in the menu at the top. If you want to delete all cookies in your browser, click From the beginning.
5. Mark cookies and other site data and add-ons.
6. Click Clear browsing data.
7. Close the window.

How to prevent cookies from being saved in your web browser:

1. Go to settings in your browser.
2. Click Show advanced settings, and then click content Settings.
3. In Cookies choose your preferred option. If you want to prevent all cookies from being saved, click 'Do not allow saving site data'.
4. Click Finish.
5. Close the window.
managingInSafariText:
How to delete cookies:

1. Go to settings in the browser menu.
2. Open the Privacy section.
3. Click Delete all data from websites, and then click Delete to delete all cookies.
4. Close the window.

How to prevent cookies from being saved in your web browser:

1. Go to settings in your browser.
2. Click the Privacy tab.
3. In the section 'cookies' and data of the web site, select your preferred option. If you want to prevent all cookies from being saved, click 'Always block'.
4. Close the window.
managingInMozillaText:
How to delete cookies:

1. Go to settings in the browser menu.
2. Open the Privacy section.
3. Click Show cookies.
4. Select the cookies you want to delete and click Delete selected. Click 'Delete all' if you want to delete all cookies in your web browser.
5. Close the window. Any changes you make will be automatically saved.

How to prevent cookies from being saved in your web browser:

1. Go to Settings in the browser menu.
2. Select the Privacy tab.
3. in the History section, click use custom settings for history.
4. Select your preferred settings in the Allow website cookies section. If you want to prevent all cookies from being stored, uncheck accept cookies from websites.
5. Close the window. Any changes you make will be saved automatically.
addInfoText:
We hope this has clarified the situation, and as mentioned earlier, if there is something you are not sure whether you need it or not, it is usually safer to leave cookies enabled if you are interacting with one of the features You use in our page.
If you are still looking for more information, you can contact us using one of your preferred communication methods or by email: info@vidodoguide.com
